description: Abuses Firebase Realtime Database to exfiltrate SMS messages and device metadata via WebSocket C2
remediation: Block Firebase domain s-usc1b-nss-2100[.]firebaseio[.]com and audit apps using custom broadcast receivers

description: Monitors screen activity and e-commerce transactions, exfiltrating data to Firebase with TLS evasion
remediation: Revoke Firebase API keys and enforce certificate pinning

description: Distributes trojanized APKs via Firebase-hosted phishing pages mimicking Telegram Premium
remediation: Takedown Firebase C2 endpoints and blacklist SHA256 hashes of malicious APKs

description: Leverages Firebase WebSocket for persistent C2 communication, enabling real-time payload delivery
remediation: Deploy YARA rules to detect Firebase WebSocket connections

description: Intercepts clipboard data and notifications via Firebase-backed dynamic receivers
remediation: Disable Firebase project androidscamru-default-rtdb and monitor for data leaks
